author: Burgess Everett
title: Martha McSally calls on WHO director to resign
description: The Arizona Republican says the organization needs to stop covering up for China.
content:
Sen. Martha McSally. | J. Scott Applewhite/AP Photo
Sen. Martha McSally is calling on the World Health Organization director general to step down over what she deems his assistance in covering up China's underreporting of the coronavirus, part of an escalati… [+867 chars]
